Fantasy2C

Fantasy2C is an object oriented multimedia library, supported with OpenGL,
uses hardware acceleration.
With additional libraries like DevIL,GLFW or Audiere.
Quickly and easily load Images, create window or play sound and music.
Fantasy2C is what you need for a 2D-Game

Features:
-Play sounds und music
-Load images from memory or file
-Load TTF files and create bitmapfont
-Draw simple sprite with image
-Draw scrolling background
-Draw array of sprites (e.g. tilemap)
-Draw texts with bitmapfonts
-Window and input managment

GNU Lesser General Public License.

Use Librarys:
OpenGL
DevIL
GLFW
Audiere
FreeType2
